alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Logan and western Johnson Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wiederkehr Village, or over Ozark, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Hartman... Hoyt... Woodland... Hinkle... Coal Hill... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Harmony... Roseville... Yale... Ozone... Union City... Hunt... Wilkins... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Western and Northern Logan County
